storyInfo: Secunda and Irene trace the data scientist's path to the city's previous stop, only to discover she is likely dead. The squadron sent to deploy the beacon was destroyed, and the Abyssal Hunters save only a few survivors.

attributes.text: The reactor of a United Starline starship still burns so brightly.
Since the atmosphere control center crashed, we've been shrouded in dull gray clouds. A radiant sight like this certainly lifts the spirit.

To my pleasant surprise, Valeria was also on the starship. I discovered once she landed that she had come to bid farewell to her mother. Ever since joining the stargate modification project, she has been completely absorbed in her duties. It was surprising to see her still concerned with worldly matters.
If she still has a mind for such things, perhaps we might finally talk about that wedding that's been put on hold for the past ten years?
â€¦I soon dismissed that thought as foolish. The woman I once knew now stood before me like a stranger. I could no longer discern what she was thinking.
As she stood before her mother's life support pod, her expression was one I had never seen before. It was neither sorrow nor regret... it was envy.
What could she possibly envy about her dying mother? Was it the peaceful release offered by the machine's simulated world?

attributes.content: You're still here, Jordi? Everyone else has left...
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Sorry, I didn't know there would be a tribunal today.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: That's okay.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: The search logs... you've asked quite a few questions. 'How big is the ocean?' 'Is it bigger than the land?' 'By how much?'
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: 'Can Ã†gir cities float to the surface?'
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: 'How do the Ã†gir tell whether it's day or night?'
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Is this how you've been trying to understand Ã†gir? I fear it may confuse you even more.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Mr. Avitus... I'm not sure why, but I feel really excited.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: In the Inquisition's nautical charts, the ocean extends only a few nautical miles from shore before giving way to unknown regions marked in grayish-blue.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: In some areas, we couldn't even get near the shore.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: But your charts are so detailed. Geological features, energy pockets, local fauna and flora... There are so many pages, I don't even know where to start.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: The forests at the heart of the ocean, icebergs that never melt, thermal vents deep in the trenches...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: For a moment, I thought that the land, sea, and sky were all mine for the taking, that I need simply reach out. Like everything was made for me.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Sorry, that sounds really arrogant, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Quite the opposite, young man. It is but a most basic desire.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: But I...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: The young Ã†gir looks up and gazes at the coral-shaped terminal. Holographic images and words leap up and down, illuminating his soft eyes.
I've been in Milliarium for a whole day now.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: But I can't handle your tech, I don't get your discussions, and I'm even lost with directions.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: The tribunal that just happened... I have no idea how you guys settled your disagreement.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: I did a search for Breogan, the ship designer, who I thought was my ancestor. I saw his face, heard his voice, and looked at his designs.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Is there really anything I have in common with him? Would his descendants really turn out to be someone... like me?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: I couldn't find a single sign that says I belong here.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Ã†gir is like a lighthouse, bright and tall. I always knew it existed, but when I finally followed its light and reached its base...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Why do I feel lost instead?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Breogan. It's been many years since his name was last spoken.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: He was a remarkable man, even amongst the Ã†gir. He was the most talented designer in the Academy of Technology, but left everything behind to go ashore, right when his country needed him most.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Even this city is connected to him, albeit in a somewhat unusual way.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: How so?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: It was through this city that he went on land. The Institute of Development Planning even tried to penalize a few consuls for failing to stop him.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Listen, Jordi. I cannot ascertain whether you are truly bound to him by blood, though such a connection holds little significance.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: What matters is that there can be no doubt that you are Ã†gir.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: I know I am. But how do I prove I belong here, if I can't even trace my own heritage?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: A true Ã†gir needs no proof of that.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: But I understand. We all search for answers in the past.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: I'm no different.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: I can say with a straight face that I am one of Ã†gir's foremost authorities on prehistory. I firmly believe in the weight of history, and that it contains truths and patterns that will show us the way forward.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: (Mutters) But what if its a way of destined destruction for Ã†gir?
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry, what was that last part?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Huh? Did you say something, Doctor?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Sorry. I was just thinking about Shark and Swordfish.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.options: They're probably on a killing spree right now.;They're probably worried about you.;Chin up, Skadi.

attributes.content: I'm not worried about them. They're strong.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Nothing good ever happened to those around me, which is why I was always aloneâ€”until I joined Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Now it's happening again.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.options: Are you afraid you'll bring disaster to the Hunters?

attributes.content: Maybe.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: But we hunters aren't afraid of the bad end we might bring to each other.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Because we all share the same grim fate, we can trust each other with our lives.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: This time though, it might not be just the Hunters.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I could bring disaster to all of Ã†gir.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.options: You won't. I believe in you.

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: That's what Captain Ulpianus always said.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: He would explain our battle plans in great detail to everyone else, but with me, he simply said he believed in me.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: ...He believed I could complete my mission even if I couldn't memorize those complex strategies.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: He was always so reliable and had an answer for everything.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I remember the songs he wrote before battles. He said we could use them as codes to communicate because the Seaborn didn't understand music.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: But I just liked the songs.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: He had a great sense of direction, too. He could always lead us all back, even when we were lost in those maze-like nests.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: We could always count on him to point the way, until...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Yes. The 1st and 4th Companies sacrificed themselves to clear a path, while the 2nd held off the Seaborn that were rushing back.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Captain Ulpanius led the charge and soon arrived at the target, the core organ of the Firstborn.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Then we lost his signal.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I thought he was dead, so it fell to me to deal the killing blow.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Yeah. I don't know what happened that day.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I still don't know why he didn't come back.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: And the more I don't know, the more I feel like I need to do something.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Ha. Rush in with a 'woosh', knock them down with a 'pow', and finish them with a 'thud'.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I remember.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Arrived at target coordinates.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: We came as fast as we could. Though not fast enough, it seems.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: This is a graveyard.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Giant shipwrecks and Seaborn remains lie entangled in a grotesque embrace. Pale flakes descend like snow.
While some have given it a more romanticized name, marine snow, it does little to hide its cruel nature: fragments of organic matter, both Seaborn and human.
The sweetness of blood and the stench of death, intensified by the cannon's lingering heat, spread with the falling flakes.
The Abyssal Hunters' strong sense of smell magnifies all of this, and Specter cannot help but cover her nose.
This shouldn't be unfamiliar to you, Shark.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: The fleet pins down the Seaborn with superior numbers as the Hunters flank and eliminate the swarm's core. We've used this tactic often.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: This is the same scene we see each time we leave their nest.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I know... perhaps we've spent too much time on land.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It's not a pleasant thing to recall.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: One engineering mothership, ten battleships, numerous smaller ships... The wreckage positions on the seabed indicate they stayed in formation. They were not taken by surprise.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: There are signs of gravitational distortion on nearby rocks. They tried to stop the Seaborn using force fields.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: But the Seaborn were faster. The ships weren't even able to form a crossfire.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: They fought with them in close quarters...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Something's not right.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: The squadron's destination was Nest 37, but all the ships appear to be headed for Milliarium.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Besides, now that the squadron is destroyed, why haven't the Seaborn made their next move?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Swordfish.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Nghâ€”
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Ughâ€”
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Alright, grab my hand.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I did tell you to stay on the corvette.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Deep-water equipment may keep you from being crushed by the water pressure, but even the Ã†gir are at the mercy of the ocean currents without proper training.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I could use some help, once you're done laughing.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Imagine you're dancing with a rowdy partner. Counter her moves and find your balance. This is how you fight the currents.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: You're light. It shouldn't be hard for you.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: ...Don't look at me like that.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I'll meet you up ahead.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: A broken lighting array...
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Trace amounts of organic tissue on the broken metal frame... Human, and Seaborn.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Find anything?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Some tissue that matches the sample provided by the Institute of Development Planning. It's Tullia.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Milliarium was parked here around 40 hours ago. Based on the location of the array, she had left from the circulation system's sewage exit at the edge of the city.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: ...But why did she leave?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: It's hard to reconstruct the scene with what's available. The currents have already washed away most of the clues.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: I'm afraid we won't find out if Tullia was a cultist with a grudge against the Waterway Program or what happened to her from here.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: This is two hours away by ship from Milliarium's present location. Even with deep-water equipment...
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: She couldn't have swum back.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Based on the remaining tissues, it seems she had encountered a Seaborn.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: There's no way she could have survived.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: A dead end.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: That's... the direction the Abyssal Hunters went.
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: The battle may be fiercer than expected.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: The Waterway Program is in its final phase. Once Nest 37 has been located, we can clear the Seaborn from this entire area and open up a Waterway.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: This can't just be a coincidence...
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Could the incident with Tullia have something to do with the attack on the fleet?
attributes.name: Irene

attributes.content: Or maybe her incident is just a red fin to distract the Sea Patrol.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: There are too many new uncertainties, as if everything's sucked in a giant vortex.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: ...Let's go back to the city for now.
attributes.name: Secunda

attributes.content: Hard bank to port, full speed ahead! Go around that ridge and turn back. That should lose a third of the Seaborn on our tail.
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: Nghâ€”
attributes.name: Ã†gir Soldier

attributes.content: Sir, the Seaborn have breached the hull!
attributes.name: Ã†gir Soldier

attributes.content: They're inside the ship!
attributes.name: Ã†gir Soldier

attributes.content: Keep the evasive maneuvers going, helmsman! We'll deal with the ones inside.
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: Camouflage coating down to 10%! We'll be fully visible soon!
attributes.name: Ã†gir Soldier

attributes.content: Buy as much time as you can!
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Ã†gir Soldier

attributes.content: Gughâ€”
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: Take care of the rest, Shark.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Abyssal Hunters?
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: Gladiia.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I recognize you, ma'am.
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: Have the other ships made it safely back to Milliarium, Madame Consul?
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: Thank goodness...
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: The more of our elites we save, the more strength we'll have for what's ahead.
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: Are you the commander of this vessel?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Yes, ma'am.
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: We were ambushed. A large swarm of Seaborn left their nests and appeared on the squadron's route... Virtually unheard of in previous beacon deployments.
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: We couldn't reveal our battle plans. We had to retreat.
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: Our ship was the fastest in the fleet. The most logical tactic was for us to delay the Seaborn while the main fleet retreated.
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: How many survivors are there on your ship?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Twenty-six... Less than one in ten.
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: Why the silence, Madame Consul?
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: I'm sorry, commander. Your ship and your twenty-six men are the only survivors.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: All Seaborn inside the ship have been eliminated.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: There's no better way to tell you, so I'll make it brief... the thousand or so men whose retreat you were covering fell into an even bigger ambush.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: We happened to see your ship weaving through the complex terrain as we arrived.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: But what you couldn't have seen is the Seaborn had you completely surrounded. You were just chasing your own tail in their trap.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: We failed the mission.
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: Yet we were the ones who lived. The losses are... much worse than expected...
attributes.name: Ã†gir Officer

attributes.content: But you did live.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Lift your head, Ã†gir.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: You and your men are just as much Ã†gir's elites, and you will give your strength to what's ahead.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: For now, Laurentina and I will bring you back to the city.
attributes.name: Gladiia
